24 namespace Native5\Services\Users;
25 
26 /**
27  * %ClassName% 
28  * 
29  * @category  Users 
30  * @package   Native5\<package>

39 interface UserManager
40 {
41     public function deactivateUser($context);
42     public function activateUser($context);
43     public function getStatus($user);
44     public function authenticate($subject);
45     public function definePasswordPolicy($policy);
46     public function applyPasswordPolicy($policy, $groups);
47     public function verifyEmail($email);
48     public function verifyToken($email, $token);
49     public function changePassword($email, $token, $newPassword);
50 }
